alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Palm Beach County through 530 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a funnel cloud along a line extending from 8 miles west of North County Airport to near Loxahatchee NWR. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Boca Raton, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, Loxahatchee NWR, Mission Bay, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Golden Lakes, North County Airport, Loxahatchee Groves, Whisper Walk, Lion Country Safari Park, Kings Point, The Acreage, Lake Belvedere Estates, Boca Del Mar, Royal Palm Estates and Aberdeen. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
